caption.p:
Effect of various doses of (a) Asphodelus tenuifolius crude extract (AT-Cr) and (b) aqueous soluble fraction of A. tenuifolius (AS-AT) in anesthetized normotensive rats on systolic blood pressure (SBP), diastolic blood pressure (DBP), and mean arterial pressure (MAP). Results are stated as mean ± SEM, whereas
∗ = P < 0.05 and
∗∗∗ = P < 0.001 when compared to the normal saline-treated group.
